DOC.brief_summary: Double blind placebo control trial evaluate whether routine use nasal irrigation mupirocin effective saline irrigation alone reduce symptom chronic rhinosinusitis early postoperative period .
DOC.brief_title: The Use Antibiotic Sinonasal Rinse After Sinus Surgery
DOC.criteria: Chronic Rhinosinusitis Undergoing endoscopic sinus surgery Age 18 Documented adverse reaction mupirocin
